name: tm58
effect: Teaches Endure to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sky Drop to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Endure)

flavor_text.black-white: The user hurls the target into the air, then drops it on the second turn. The target cannot attack while in the air.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user hurls the target into the air, then drops it on the second turn. The target cannot attack while in the air.
